analysis.description:
CoinParkToken.unlock (/unique_contracts/0xfd45e61e085b3e7a1990a47828d757755b206eee.sol#290-309) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- CoinParkToken.lockedBalance
	- BasicToken.balances
	- CoinParkToken.timeRelease
